name: InnerSpace Technology, Inc.
description: Developer of an indoor mapping and location intelligence platform designed to improve the usage of indoor space. The company's platform gives insight into how people use their space which drives revenue and improves operations in their smart buildings, enabling businesses to access data to action and utilize indoor spaces more efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an indoor mapping and location intelligence platform designed to improve the usage of indoor space. The company's platform gives insight into how people use their space which drives revenue and improves operations in their smart buildings, enabling businesses to access data to action and utilize indoor spaces more efficiently.
